tool_description: Elevate your verification process to new heights with D7 Verifier API - the ultimate solution for phone number verification!
name: D7 Verify
title: D7 Verify

api_list.name: Get OTP Status
api_list.description: Get the status of OTP generated or verified

required_parameters.name: otp_id
required_parameters.description: The otp_ id which was returned from **Send OTP** endpoint

detail.message: It looks like your requests were failed due to a missing or invalid 'Access Token'. Sign up at https://app.d7networks.com and create an authentication token in the developer section.

api_list.name: Check Balance
api_list.description: Get information about current balance on your D7API account
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://d7-verify.p.rapidapi.com/messages/v1/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7-verify.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

detail.message: It looks like your requests were failed due to a missing or invalid 'Access Token'. Sign up at https://app.d7networks.com and create an authentication token in the developer section.

api_list.name: Verify OTP
api_list.description: At this endpoint, you can verify the OTP the customer enters in your application.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://d7-verify.p.rapidapi.com/verify/v1/otp/verify-otp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7-verify.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Resend OTP
api_list.description: If the OTP is not received by the customer, you can use the **Resend OTP** endpoint to generate a new one.  Before requesting a resend, there must be a minimum 60-second delay, which can be adjusted in [profile](https://app.d7networks.com/verify/settings).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://d7-verify.p.rapidapi.com/verify/v1/otp/resend-otp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7-verify.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Generate OTP
api_list.description: Send an OTP to a mobile number for verification. Once the customer receives it and enters it in your app, then you can call the **Verify OTP** endpoint to verify it
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://d7-verify.p.rapidapi.com/verify/v1/otp/send-otp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7-verify.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
